channel.title: How to change the weather?
channel.description:
So I tried Googling it to no avail and only found this with search :http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,432485.msg3175032.html#msg3175032
Is there a simple command to do it or something more complex?

item.title: How to change the weather?
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

do it this way: the way you make pvp or look at Isinwild method, try to find the choords or where the snow starts and stops and you should be able to crack down on what is making it happen

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the weather?
item.dc:creator: @JesusFishTaco101 JesusFishTaco101
item.description:
@JesusFishTaco101 wrote:

Yeah I meant taking the snow out, and assumed you meant it would lag the server more to do so.

Also I search ALL files in the server and client folders and didn’t find anything that looked related to weather/snow:(

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the weather?
item.dc:creator: @Dario14 Dario14
item.description:
@Dario14 wrote:

He thought you were trying to add it, not remove it. Adding it however would cause lagg, not the other way around.

Try looking through all of your files for stuff to do with snow and removing it. I think it will be in Player.java something along the lines of public int snowOn;

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the weather?
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

Think you or I am confused you are removing it or you want to add it?

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the weather?
item.dc:creator: @JesusFishTaco101 JesusFishTaco101
item.description:
@JesusFishTaco101 wrote:

llcoolchris:

it’s very possible but not many would want this, it introduces lagg into the server.

So removing them would actually cause more lag? I thought for sure it would be the other way around, shows how much I know…

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the weather?
item.dc:creator: @llcoolchris llcoolchris
item.description:
@llcoolchris wrote:

More then likely the particles are there since all servers have had their models ripped from runescape itself using a kind of bot program. it’s just finding what these particles are called and having a command releasing them, it’s very possible but not many would want this, it introduces lagg into the server. That’s why noone has actually made a well thought out snippet of some sort for it

Read full topic

item.title: How to change the weather?
item.dc:creator: @JesusFishTaco101 JesusFishTaco101
item.description:
@JesusFishTaco101 wrote:

And I put those in my client.java?

Read full topic
